shortestwikipath-extension-desc: Adds a special page to calculate the shortest path between two articles.
shortestwikipath-summary:
I will help you find the shortest way between two articles.

Currently, the {{SITENAME}} has a total of [[Special:All Pages|{{formatnum:{{NUMBEROFARTICLES}}}} articles]] that have links between them. To find the shortest route between all the links, I use the [[wikipedia:en:Dijkstra's algorithm|Dijkstra algorithm]]. Enter the start and finish article in the form below and press “$1”. You can also $2, then I will try to also link from the target to the original article.
shortestwikipath-error-from: Attention: The given start page “$1” does not exist!
shortestwikipath-error-to: Attention: The given target page “$1” does not exist!
shortestwikipath-error-both: Attention: The given pages “$1” and “$2” does not exist!
shortestwikipath-no-way: Attention: I could not connect between “[[$1]]” and “[[$2]]”.
shortestwikipath-self-linking: Attention: The specified pages „[[$1]]“ and „[[$2]]“ are identical.
shortestwikipath-forward: I have found {{#ifeq:$5|1|'''a direct connection|following shortest path with '''{{formatnum:$5}} hops}}''' between „[[$1]]“ and „[[$2]]“:
shortestwikipath-duration: For the search, I analyzed {{formatnum:$3}} nodes and {{formatnum:$4}} edges in {{formatnum:$2}} calculations in {{formatnum:$1}} seconds.
